title: Extend farther-steps for zikaron context proposals
description: Add support for context-proposal step type and smart merge functionality to farther-steps, enabling integration with zikaron active learning system.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add `fsteps preview ID` command to show diff for context-proposals
Implement smart merge in `apply` for context-proposal type (section-aware)
Support `position` field for placement hints (after:section, end)
Add `--auto-high` flag for auto-apply with confidence >= 0.9 and evidence >= 5
Document new step types in README.md farther-steps section
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
